title: Business Header
content:
Working for a client who has lost details of person who created Business header. Can anyone recognize this font, Have been close to it, But not the same..

Thanks for everyone's help..

Font: 

 Handel Gothic 

Solved By: 

 [Renko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417081834/http:/typophile.com/user/12000 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417081834/http:/typophile.com/files/1_99.jpg) | 7.86 KB |
author: Valtec

comments.content: Thanks Renko. That was the correct font, saved me alot of time. Cheers!
